sentences.en: All South American monkeys have flat noses with widely spaced nostril.
sentences.cn: 所有南美洲的猴子都有平鼻子和宽大的鼻孔.

sentences.en: Breathe in through the right nostril three times, and exhale through the mouth.
sentences.cn: 以右鼻孔吸气三次, 以嘴呼气.

sentences.en: Dark night give me black eyes, but I welcome brightness with nostril.
sentences.cn: 不见不散:黑夜给了我黑色的眼睛, 我却用鼻孔迎接光明.

sentences.en: DATA : Not ready reading right nostril. Abort, Retry, Fail?
sentences.cn: 右鼻孔读取尚未就绪. 放弃 、 重试 、 失败?

sentences.en: Father says: " if you nosebleed, can you still dig nostril? "
sentences.cn: 爸爸说: [ 假如你流鼻血了, 你还会挖鼻孔 吗 ?

sentences.en: First check that there is no foreign body lodged in the nostril - grass seedgrass etc.
sentences.cn: 首先检查龟龟鼻孔有无异物——草字或者草等等.

sentences.en: Is digging nostril nose bright or hand bright?
sentences.cn: 挖鼻孔是鼻子爽还是手爽?

sentences.en: On the paralyzed side the ear is pendulous, the eye partly closed, and the nostril immobilized.
sentences.cn: 在麻痹的一侧,耳下垂; 眼半闭, 鼻孔不运动.

sentences.en: Only 30 % of people can magnify and shorten their nostril.
sentences.cn: 只有30%的人可以放大缩小自己的鼻孔.

sentences.en: Repeat with left nostril, exhale through the right.
sentences.cn: 换左鼻孔重复, 以右鼻孔呼气.

sentences.en: The nose : beautifully formed otherwise, was very slightly pinched at the top of each nostril.
sentences.cn: 那鼻子若不是在两道鼻翼上略微凹下了些,便可以算得上漂亮.

sentences.en: The nose, beautifully formed otherwise was very slightly pinched at the top of one nostril.
sentences.cn: 那鼻子要不是有个鼻孔顶端稍微凹下, 是美丽的.

sentences.en: The perfume of wild flower fille her nostril.
The smell of gunpowder filled his nostrils.
There was the same refinement of brow and nostril in both.
sentences.cn: 两人的额头和鼻梁同样细嫩.

sentences.en: Why do gorillas have big nostril?

trans.tran_en: one of the two holes at the end of your nose, through which you breathe and smell things
